title: Ticket #1432: Missing documentation for submit file parameter, SUBMIT_SKIP_FILECHECK
description:
condor_submit implements an option called SUBMIT_SKIP_FILECHECKS, but it is not in the documentation. It should be.

It is equivalent to the -disable option, so that can be used as the basis for the documentation.
remarks:
2010-Jun-08 14:30:46 by roy:
I got confused about this: I thought it was a submit file option, but it's a config file option. In fact, it is in the configuration portion of the manual, and there is nothing here to fix.

Sorry for the confusion.
creator: roy
